channel.title: Accueil on DevFest du Bout du Monde 2020
channel.description: Recent content in Accueil on DevFest du Bout du Monde 2020

item.title: Code of Conduct
item.description: 1. Purpose A primary goal of DevFest du Bout du Monde is to be inclusive to the largest number of contributors, with the most varied and diverse backgrounds possible. As such, we are committed to providing a friendly, safe and welcoming environment for all, regardless of gender, sexual orientation, ability, ethnicity, socioeconomic status, and religion (or lack thereof). DevFest du Bout du Monde prides itself on being an open, respectful, and inclusive community.
